name: Minor Players in Classic TV Online Trivia | Mixture: Classics | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Cheers.

	Swanson played Woody's girlfriend, Kelly. Rees played Kirstie Alley's boyfriend, Robin Colcord. New cast members are often brought in to "breathe new blood" into a series that has been on for a while.

MASH.

	Winter played the off-center Lt. Flagg, who worked for Intelligence -but didn't seem to have any.

That Girl.

	Parker played the restaurantuer father of Marlo Thomas. Rosemary DeCamp played Marlo's mother.

Dobie Gillis.

	Franken played rich kid Chatsworth Osborne, Jr. Dwayne Hickman and Bob Denver (before "Gilligan").

Benson.

	Noble played Benson's boss, the governor: good heart, but a bit slow on the uptake.

Odd Couple.

	Hansen played Felix's ex-wife, Gloria. Hotchikis played Oscar's doctor girlfriend.

Three's Company.

	Charney played Mr. Angelino, Jack's boss in the restaurant (before Jack got his own place). Comforti played Felipe, a restaurant employee with limited English language skills.

One Day At A Time.

	Campanella played Bonnie Franklin's ex-husband (and the father of Mackenzie Phillips and Valerie Bertinelli)in a few episodes.

Hogan's Heroes.

	Talbot appeared several times as a Russian woman of uncertain loyalties.

Bewitched.

	White played Larry Tate, the head of the ad agency for which Darrin worked.
